createDialog.title: Create Attribute
createDialog.description: Add a new attribute type (e.g. Color, Thickness).
createDialog.isParamDescTrue: Allows this attribute to have multiple parameters (e.g. Red, Blue for the Color attribute).
createDialog.isParamDescFalse: This attribute will not have parameters and will be used only for categorization (e.g. the 'Type' attribute with values like 'Machine', 'Operator').

deleteDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete "{{name}}"? This action cannot be undone.
